description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play, record, and jam along to original music with Drum XPlosion 2.  Select from several predefined drum kits or mix and match from over 70 different drum sounds to make new kits.  Each drum sound can be modified by manipulating pitch, volume, and reverb.
description.short: Play, record, and jam along to original music with Drum XPlosion 2.  Select from several predefined drum kits or mix and match from over 70 different drum sounds to make new kits.  Each drum sound can be modified by manipulating pitch, volume, and reverb.
